languages.text: {n}Увы, зараза расползлась широко, клан бригадиров успел раскинуть щупальца, умножая число погибших.{/n}
{n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Увы, зараза расползлась широко, клан бригадиров успел раскинуть щупальца, умножая число погибших.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Sadly, the plague had already spread far, the brigadier clan had spread its tentacles, and multiplying the death toll.{/n}
{n}Sadly, the plague had already spread far, the brigadier clan had spread its tentacles, and multiplying the death toll.{/n}
{n}Sadly, the plague and reach of the brigadier clan had spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}
{n}Sadly, the plague and reach of the brigadier clan had spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}
{n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}
{n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}

languages.text: {n}遗憾的是，瘟疫与领班氏族的影响已经传播得非常广泛，死亡人数也相当高。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}遗憾的是，瘟疫与领班氏族的影响已经传播得非常广泛，死亡人数也相当高。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Por desgracia, tanto la plaga como la influencia del clan de capataces ya se habían extendido demasiado, lo que multiplicó el número de fallecidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Por desgracia, tanto la plaga como la influencia del clan de capataces ya se habían extendido demasiado, lo que multiplicó el número de fallecidos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}悲しいことに、この疫病と准将一族の勢力範囲は広範に及んでいたため、死者の数は倍増した。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}悲しいことに、この疫病と准将一族の勢力範囲は広範に及んでいたため、死者の数は倍増した。{/n}
{n}悲しいことに、この疫病と准将一族の勢力範囲は広範に及んでいたため、死者の数は倍増した。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Malheureusement, l'épidémie et l'influence du clan des chefs d'équipe se sont tant répandues à tous les niveaux que le nombre de victimes s'en trouve démultiplié.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Malheureusement, l'épidémie et l'influence du clan des chefs d'équipe se sont tant répandues à tous les niveaux que le nombre de victimes s'en trouve démultiplié.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Leider hatten sich die Seuche und der Einfluss des Vorarbeiter-Clans bereits weit verbreitet, was die Zahl der Toten vervielfachte.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Leider hatten sich die Seuche und der Einfluss des Vorarbeiter-Clans bereits weit verbreitet, was die Zahl der Toten vervielfachte.{/n}
{n}Leider hatten sich die Seuche und der Einfluss des Brigadierclan schon sehr weit verbreitet, was die Zahl der Toten vervielfachte.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Ne yazık ki hem veba hem de ustabaşı klanının nüfuzu, hâlihazırda dünyanın dört bir yanına yayıldı. Bu da ölü sayısını katbekat artırdı.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Sadly, both the plague and the influence of the foreman clan had already spread far and wide, multiplying the death toll.{/n}
